entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #49975
  • Quarantine HttpsConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #49974
  • .net 8 preview 7: published Blazor app cannot start with js failed to load blazor.boot.json #49973
  • ApiExplorer provides no reference type nullability info for API response types #49971
  • Introduce an IServiceCollection extension method for enabling HTTPS configuration #49967
    8.0-rc1
  • Quarantine LongPollingUsesHttp2ByDefault #49966
  • .NET Preview 7 - Possible form handling regression #49965
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49963
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc #49962
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads #49961
  • Components E2E failure - error EnableGenerateDocumentationFile #49960
  • Rewrite stdout/err redirection logic in ANCM #49959
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Expose BearerAndApplicationScheme and CompositeIdentityHandler. #49957
  • .NET 8 preview7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #49956
    8.0-rc2
  • OnLocationChanged not fired in .NET 8 Preview 7 Blazor Web App #49950
    8.0-rc2
  • Empty render when using [RenderModeWebAssembly(false)] in .NET 8 Preview 7 #49949
  • Navigation with stack #49948
    Backlog
  • [RequestSizeLimit(100_000_000)] not working. #49946

Closed

  • type or namespace 'App' could not be found #49690
  • How to render a matrix correctly in Blazor? #49945
  • Setting route order imperatively #47579
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #49639
  • Perf improvement: json #49852
  • Identity endpoints break clients generated from Open API #49720
  • Preview 7 Antiforgery addition breaking existing working blazor server app #49952
  • Extended IdentityDbContext doesn't add migration he exception 'Cannot use table 'CFGPerfilClaim' for entity type 'PerfilClaim' since it is being used for entity type 'IdentityRoleClaim<int>' and potentially other entity types #49878
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger: error when message circular reference #49951
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextSansFilter #49912
  • Add metadata types for form reading and mapping options #49844
    8.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #49976
    area-blazor
  • Add tests for null response scenarios to RDG #49970
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Create transport package for API docs #49969
    area-infrastructure
  • Synchronize KestrelTrace next-id comments #49964
    area-runtime
  • Remove code handling cases where NSI API isn't supported #49944
    area-runtime
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #49943
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Quarantine `InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #49968
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Fix WebView renderer not correctly dispatching browser events #49958
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Make stdout/stderr redirection thread timeout configurable #49942
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix some trim warnings in Components.Endpoints #49890
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Add support for options in form-binding and anti-forgery #49935
    area-mvc, area-minimal, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable navigation when RenderModeServer #49768
    area-blazor
  • Support NativeAOT in PropertySetter #49897
    area-blazor
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2239938 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    area-signalr
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
